name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Oekaki Puzzle
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

"Oekaki Puzzle"(Nonogram) offers 500 puzzle games for short-time enjoyment. Detailed tutorial mode make beginners feel at ease, so enjoy yourself with this puzzle game!

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
